alert.note: Alert for Custer; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 11:05PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of central Big Horn, west central Custer and southern Rosebud Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1103 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong winds along a line extending from 18 miles west of Colstrip to 7 miles northwest of Lodge Grass. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colstrip, Lodge Grass, Lame Deer, Busby, Crow Agency, Brandenberg, Muddy Cluster, Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
